issue.title: [CI][C++] Enable Flight and Flight SQL on ubuntu cpp 18.04 builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17723](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17723). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently Dockerfiles for ubuntu 18.04 cpp builds don't have Flight and / or Flight SQL enabled. This ticket is to add support for it.
